DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect eat breakfast combination exercise fat usage , appetite brain performance later day .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Exercise With Without Breakfast , Metabolism , Appetite Cognition
DOC.criteria: Male Aged 1845 year BMI 18.524.9 kg/m2 Physically active : able run 1 h moderate pace Healthy Smokers Food allergy Metabolic disorder Restrained eater ( equivalent > 7 restrain TFEQ ) Consuming herbal/dietary supplement History head trauma Learning difficulty ADHD Dyslexia History migraine Gastric problem
